plugin_faminta_how_to_get_rating_for_fre:
How to get rating points for free.

It’s really easy, there are two options available:

  1. You write great comments that get rated by other users, and your rating goes up. However, if you post something unpopular with the community, you post will receive a lot of negative ratings and you will wave goodbye to you hard-won reputation. As practice shows, it’s really hard to gain weight in the community by making comments only, since it’s very hard to make everyone happy by expressing your opinion.
  2. You can also write articles: short, to-the-point, hot and exciting. This involves more effort. However, readers’ gratitude will be more significant and your rating will go up faster. We recommend choosing this path. Better write one short article than post 50 comments.

P.S. Try to avoid endlessly criticizing the administration. People get tired of it very quickly, since they come here to relax, not quarrel. Try to post news, recipes, pieces of advice, your own stories – and you will find your readers very soon.

© Master Tigra team

plugin_refpartnership_common_partnerOffi: Statistics, payouts and other useful information are available in the personal partner office.
plugin_refpartnership_ov_benefits_1: Accessible to anyone, regardless of experience and knowledge
plugin_refpartnership_ov_benefits_3: Membership in the partner program is free
plugin_refpartnership_ov_benefits_4: Informational and technical support of partners
plugin_refpartnership_ov_forMasterApp_bt: Get a app and start making money
plugin_refpartnership_ov_forMasterApp_te:
You can host our apps

We offer an opportunity to place our apps on your sites. Our apps will help you make your site a better place, draw additional traffic, keep visitors on the site, increase conversion and return rate.

You will be awarded for any purchases made in applications you feature on your site, as well as for any other purchases in our team’s applications made by the users you referred.
plugin_refpartnership_ov_forMasterRef_te:
For webmasters and site owners

Make money with referral links

Post referral links, banners and other ad materials on the pages of your site and draw traffic to various entertainment resources of Master Tigra. Use your sites to promote our projects and we will lavishly share our income with you.

We will help you generate a referral link, and provide the necessary marketing materials. You pick the preferred promotion method, post links and start monitoring the intriguing statistics of your earnings.
plugin_refpartnership_ov_forUser_btn: Get a link and start making money
plugin_refpartnership_ov_forUser_text:
Invite and make money

Get rich with us with a minimum of effort and doing what you probably like to do on a daily basis — sharing interesting links with friends, family and other subscribers of your blogs and social network pages. You will be making money for each user who comes to us by following your link.

Becoming a member of the referral program is very easy – simply start inviting users by popularizing our service and sharing information about our projects.

Share links in social networks

This is an excellent money-making opportunity for everyone. Even if you don’t have your own website or blog, you can share links with your friends and subscribers in social networks. Start right now by generating your individual referral link.

Share interesting articles

Share links to interesting articles on Faminta using special buttons at the end of each article. Sign in to our site and all of your links will automatically become referral links. Just read, share and make money with us.

Recommend us in blogs and on forums

Like blogging, posting on forums and other sites? Write articles and post referral links. We will help you pick the right texts or advertising materials.
plugin_refpartnership_ov_headerText:
The affiliate program of the «Master Tigra» team is a simple and widely accessible method of making money by cooperating with popular entertainment projects.

We offer a host of exciting opportunities for cooperation and are always looking forward to new prospects. Below is a list of our affiliate program’s features. Pick the most convenient form of cooperation and get 30% of all payments made by the users you referred.

tags_help_standart_ul: Unnumbered list, each item is given a tag <li>, a set of items in the list put the tag <ul>.

user_field_error_add_no_title: You must specify a title field
user_field_error_name_exists: Field with that name already exists
user_friend_add_deleted: This user rejected your friendship offer
user_friend_add_time_limit: You too often send private messages, try adding to friend later
user_friend_already_exist: This user is already your friend
user_friend_del_notice_text: User %%login%% is not your friend anymore
user_friend_del_notice_title: You've been removed from friendship list
user_friend_del_ok: You're no longer friends with this user
user_friend_offer_text:
User %%login%% wants to add you to friends list.

%%user_text%%

Accept - Reject
user_friend_offer_title: User %%login%% wants to be your friend
user_login_bad: Something is wrong! Wrong login (e-mail) or password?.
user_not_activated:
You have not activated your account.
Re-activation request
user_vote_error_acl: You don't have enough rating and power to vote!
user_vote_error_already: You've already voted for this yser!
user_vote_error_guest: You have to logon before voting
validate_captcha_not_valid: Field %%field%% is not a valid code
validate_compare_must_greater_equal: Field %%field%% must be greater than or equal to %%compare_value%%
validate_compare_must_less_equal: Field %%field%% must be less than or equal to %%compare_value%%
validate_compare_must_not_equal: Field %%field%% must not be equal to %%compare_value%%
validate_email_not_valid: Field %%field%% is not a valid email address
validate_string_no_lenght: Field %%field%% is of the wrong length (should be %%length%% characters)
validate_string_too_long: Field %%field%% is too long (maximum is %%max%% characters).
validate_string_too_short: Field %%field%% is too short (minimum is %%min%% characters)
validate_tags_count_more: Field %%field%% contains too many tags (maximum is %%count%%)
validate_tags_empty: Field %%field%% does not contain a tag, or has the wrong tag (size tag from %%min%% to %%max%% characters)
validate_url_not_valid: Field %%field%% is not a valid URL
wall_add_error: Error adding a post to the wall
wall_add_pid_error: At this message can not be reply
wall_add_quest: To be able to post a entries on the wall need to register.
wall_add_time_limit: You can't send post on wall a frequent rate
wall_list_empty: On the wall there are no entries, you can be the first!
